sentences.english: The new wish book just came in the mail.
sentences.chinese: 新的郵購目錄剛隨郵件送來了。

sentences.english: The things ordered by mail are usually paid on delivery.
sentences.chinese: 通常郵購商品都是貨到付款的。

sentences.english: That mail-order company has been convicted of mail fraud.
sentences.chinese: 那家郵購公司被判有郵政詐騙罪。

sentences.english: I couldn't get this kind of lamp in town, so I sent away for it.
sentences.chinese: 在城裏我買不到這種電燈，所以我寄款郵購。

sentences.english: He markets hogs with promotional barbeques and sells pork to consumers by mail order.
sentences.chinese: 他開辦燒烤會促銷豬肉，還接受郵購訂單。

sentences.english: We''re a high-volume, discount mail-order house.
sentences.chinese: 我們是大規模的折價郵購公司。

sentences.english: Grey-market perfumes and toiletries are now commonly sold by mail.
sentences.chinese: 水貨香水和化妝品現在常常通過郵購方式售賣。

sentences.english: A TAX dispute as old as mail-order catalogues turned into warfare this month.
sentences.chinese: 一項跟郵購目錄一樣古老的稅務糾紛在這個月開戰了。

sentences.english: Mecoxlane is the first foreign-owned mailorder company in China.
sentences.chinese: 麥考林是中國第一家外資郵購企業。

sentences.english: You can buy roses from a garden center or buy by mail order.
sentences.chinese: 你可以從園藝中心購買玫瑰或者郵購。

sentences.english: The products on the mail order catalogue look fancy.
sentences.chinese: 這郵購目錄上的產品看起來很不錯。

sentences.english: TAX dispute as old as mail-order catalogues turned into warfare this month.
sentences.chinese: 一項跟郵購目錄一樣古老的稅務糾紛在這個月開戰了。

sentences.english: We provide Products Knowlege, Installation, Sales and Service training course.
sentences.chinese: 我們也提供全國和國際性郵購服務。

sentences.english: She acted a mail-ordered Russian bride in that movie.
sentences.chinese: 在那部電影裏，她扮演一位俄羅斯郵購新娘。

definition: open shelves (in self-service store or user access library)
